body: Meh that last chapter was no big deal

I would assume the NTR is about the "bonus story" starting on pg. 169. They talk about Kou on pg. 177, how she took a penis other than yours. But the story is at the end and completely skippable. I'd recommend doing so. NTR = shit
Not dissapointed but rather happy but why is there a NTR Tag on this ?
